options: ['Because they may want to sit on the platform.', 'Because they will swim during the tour.', 'Because it makes them warm.', 'Because they will take a spa.']
questions: Why should tourists bring a towel or a rug?
article:
Travel Voucher  :
Please download Travel Voucher from this website.For every confirmed booking 
you will be required to print a voucher which is presented at the destination.You will receive a link to your voucher by email once your booking is confirmed.
